com.bigdata.btree

Class MyEvictionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.btree.DefaultEvictionListener
      • com.bigdata.btree.MyEvictionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvictionListener, HardReferenceQueueEvictionListener<PO>

    public class MyEvictionListener
extends DefaultEvictionListener
    Extends DefaultEvictionListener to explicitly control when an eviction notice is expected and to verify that eviction notices are received as expected.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyEvictionListener

        public MyEvictionListener()

    • Method Detail

      • setExpectedRefs

        public void setExpectedRefs(PO[] refs)
        Set the next N expected references for eviction notices. You can only do this when nothing is currently expected.
        Parameters:
        refs - The expected references.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateExecption - unless there is no current expected reference.

      • setExpectedRef

        public void setExpectedRef(PO ref)
        Set the expected reference for the next eviction notice. The listener will thrown an exception if there is a cache eviction unless you first invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        ref - The expected reference or null to cause the listener to throw an exception if a reference is evicted.

      • assertEvicted

        public void assertEvicted()
        Test for an eviction event.
        Throws:
        junit.framework.AssertionFailedError - if nothing was evicted since the last time an expected eviction reference was set.

      • assertEvictionCount

        public void assertEvictionCount(int expected)
        Test for the expected #of eviction notices to date.
        Parameters:
        expected -

      • getEvictionCount

        public int getEvictionCount()
        The #of eviction notices to date.

      • evicted

        public void evicted(HardReferenceQueue<PO> queue,
           PO ref)
        Throws:
        junit.framework.AssertionFailedError - if the evicted reference is not the next expected eviction reference or if no eviction is expected.
